couponTitle: Save $100 Off
couponDescription:
Use this Hotels.com promo code at checkout to receive $100 off your 12-night booking. Please follow the details below to receive your rebate.

After you complete your stay, visit  print out the form, fill it out, and mail it to: Hotels.com Rebate Processing Department, 5000 West Kearney St., Springfield, MO 65803. Hotels.com must receive the completed form within thirty (30) days of your completed stay.
